front.title: COSE Header parameter for RFC 3161 Time-Stamp Tokens

abstract.t: RFC 3161 provides a method for timestamping a message digest to prove that the message was created before a given time. This document defines a CBOR Signing And Encrypted (COSE) header parameter that can be used to combine COSE message structures used for signing (i.e., COSE_Sign and COSE_Sign1) with existing RFC 3161-based timestamping infrastructure.
